alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Lebanon; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 2:14PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN YORK...SOUTHEASTERN DAUPHIN AND SOUTHWESTERN LEBANON COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT... At 214 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Steelton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Valley Green around 220 PM EDT. New Cumberland around 225 PM EDT. Middletown, Steelton and Highspire around 230 PM EDT. Progress, Rutherford and Lawnton around 235 PM EDT. Hummelstown, Colonial Park and Paxtonia around 240 PM EDT. Hershey, Palmyra and Campbelltown around 245 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include York Haven, Three Mile Island, Lewisberry, Goldsboro and Capital City Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
